response.original_title: Querida Chick: Jessica Sarah Rinland to Chick Strand
response.overview: Garbiñe Ortega, Artistic Director of Punto de Vista, came up with the idea of creating a collective audiovisual project in which several filmmakers would make a filmed letter addressed to another filmmaker they did not know personally and who was as far as possible from their own cinema. This is how THE LETTERS THAT WEREN'T AND ALSO ARE was born. The result is an exciting journey through their affinities, their admiration and their creative processes.
response.title: Querida Chick: Jessica Sarah Rinland to Chick Strand

release_dates.note: Punto de Vista International Documentary Film Festival of Navarra
